title: DaleyEdster
author: DaleyEdster
content: The Sanctuary Genesis Pups NFT GiveawayTo celebrate the upcoming mint of 5,555 Genesis Pups NFTs on 27th April 2023 we are giving you the chance to win one of 25 prizes!Prizes3 x Genesis Pups NFTs (free mint)10 x OG-Pup Discord roles12 x Sanctuary Whitelist Spots for the upcoming mintThere are 4 different types of Pups to collect - German Shepherd, Beagle, Labrador and Great Dane.Holding all 4 types of NFT will entitle you to passive income from future subscription box / e-commerce sales, K9 Crate etc.How to enter:1) Enter the Gleam Campaign here - https://gleam.io/competitions/Z6mpD-the-sanctuary-genesis-pups-nft-giveaway2) Complete the required tasks.3) If you've participated in previous Crypto Dragons Den promotions you can unlock bonus entries. Register on Gleam with your e-mail to get bonus entries in future promotions.Duration of the Campaign: - 12th April - 20th April 2023.Announcement of winners: - 21st April on The Sanctuary Discord channel=======================================================Learn more about The SanctuaryWebsite: https://dogsanctuarynft.comDiscord: https://discord.gg/6ebSAaBWMhTwitter: https://twitter.com/DogSanctuaryNFTPlease do not post your referral links or proof of participation on Bitcointalk. If you have questions, go to The Sanctuary Discord channel.

comments.author: Football. RT
comments.body: #PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Football. RTForum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profileTelegram Username: @mdrifat104Participated Campaigns: Twitter,Telegram, Tik Tok BSC Wallet Address: 0x8C27810d51f192f7DE7216d5b3A22ebA82bef960
